name: Helmgard
description:
You want to play this game that everyone is talking about but you don't have the money to pay for it. You thought you could just pirate the game. However, the game's AI is hostile towards you.

All music downloaded from https://www.zapsplat.com - I really recommend this website if you are not good at making music (like I am)

Some sound effects are also from https://www.zapsplat.com
